interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Yes To Face Wipes for Women and Men, Sensitive Facial Cleansing Wipes for use as a Make Up Remover, Cleaning, Soothing, Cucumbers Aloe Vera (Pack of 2) Review Date: 2018/05/20 Store: Yes To Product Description: ["Yes To Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes gently remove dirt, sweat and makeup (eye makeup too!) without the need to rinse. Whether you're out and about, going for a run, or having a late night, these wipes make it a snap to refresh on-the-go. Packed with green superfoods these all-natural, biodegradable wipes naturally refresh and rejuvenate all-in-one. Stay gorgeous, and go from zero to clean in seconds! Snap up the lid and snatch out a towelette! Gently glide across your face and neck. Feel refreshed? You should- your skin is clean, revitalized and nourished- in just a snap! These 95% natural, oil-free, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic wipes are made with compostable, FSC certified fabric. They are petroleum free, SLS free, paraben free, and cruelty-free. Say Yes to Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes! These 2 pack wipes are specifically sold by the manfucaturer. We can&rsquo. INGREDIENTS Water, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativas (Cucumber) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, Sodium Chloride (Sea Salt), Carpylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance."] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yes To', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Compostable Warning', 'Unit Count': '60 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '4.6 x 3.75 x 5.5 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1024734', 'UPC': '815921024734', 'Manufacturer': 'Yes To Inc.', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More'} Review Text: I love them!
I have crazy sensitive skin, so I wanted to test these out for a while before commenting, and I am very pleased with these. They are soothing and are perfectly suitable for my sensitive skin. They are not stripping, and I've went through them without one single reaction to them (and my skin hates a lot of stuff). I would definitely repurchase.

Face wipes can't compare to truly washing your face with a cleanser; my skin (which needs it's exfoliation) is at it's best and most polished when I wash fully with a cleanser. But life happens, and last nights happen, and face wipes are 1000% better than sleeping in your makeup. They're also great for mornings when you don't really need the full cleansing routine, or as pre-wash makeup removed in the evening if you have on a lot of long wearing makeup. So many uses, and wipes are a staple in my bathroom cabinet. And these are some of the gentlest ones I've tried.

I absolutely recommend for sensitive or dry skin. Review Title: Sensitive Skin Friendly!!!! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Ulta Eyeshadow Palette, Metals Ulta {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.1 x 3.5 x 0.7 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '717897052646'} I really like this palette, but feel it should be noted that it is NOT as expected. Very nice colors, but more subdued than bold, more satin/shimmer than metallic. This is my first Ulta palette and I am happy with the quality. I only deducted one star because the colors are somewhat other than expected. I paid $12.

I specifically bought it for the green color, and I still like the green color, but it's not as bright or as metallic as the collection name caused me to expect. The finish is something of a shimmering satin, not metallic. The colors are somewhat subdued. The package says "jewel tones" which may be more accurate than the "metals" description, but still (to me) implies more brightly colored shades, with fewer earth tones. I would also expect a "jewel toned" palette to include a strong purple, and this only has the lilac (Dynasty). (The Royal looks purple but swatched brown with a hint of burgundy.) The colors are more woodsy than jeweled. The green is more mossy than emerald, the purple more floral than jeweled, the blue more night sky than sapphire.

The quality of the shadows is good. Neither buttery nor powdery, it's a slightly dry formula that nevertheless doesn't kick up a lot of product or cause a lot of fall out. I wear them over a primer, but I have been happy with their wear time. As stated above, pigmentation is good in that you don't have to build heavily, but it's also not a bright coloring.

A lovely bonus is that I actually love the brush that comes with this item! How often do you say that about a brush in a palette? It's not only soft and usable, it's unique among my brush collection. It's flufflier and less flat that most brushes of it's size, and it's also smaller and more pinpointed that most brushes that have a bit of fluffiness to them. Overall, I feel like it gives good control while still blending well. It's quickly become a favorite brush.

There may have been a naming crisis when creating this palette, lol. As the palette name is Metals, the subtitle is Jewels, and every individual shade is named with a royalty/gentry theme. The shares are: Noble (white), Lady (pale pink), Reign (earthy pink), Crown (gold), Dynasty (lilac), Royal (brown), Honor (platinum), Jester (silver), Armor (bronze), Fortress (green), Duchess (navy), and Duke (off black). No mattes, all satin/shimmer. All smooth, no fall out, some apply more evenly than others (drier formula). Swatched dry on dry skin in photo. Will build to brighter, more shiny finish.

I ordered this palette on a whim, and I've enjoyed it. However, if you are wanted super metallic finishes or bright colors, you should manage your expectations. Lovely palette, poorly named. Real Techniques Bold Metals: Diamond Sponge, Create Shadow or Highlighting, Multi Surfaced for Variety of Application, Synthetic Materials, Latex Free Real Techniques ['Real Techniques Bold Metals: Diamond Sponge, Create Shadow or Highlighting, Multi Surfaced for Variety of Application, Synthetic Materials, Latex Free'] {'Brand': 'Real Techniques', 'Color': 'Diamond', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.35 x 2 x 5.12 inches', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Highlighting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.35 x 2 x 5.12 inches; 0.48 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1552', 'UPC': '079625915525', 'Manufacturer': 'Paris Presents Incorporated'} I like this, but I don't love it. It works well, but I don't think it really stands out as a revolutionary shape or as a favorite among my sponge collection.

The feature of this sponge that I like best and used the most is the pointed tip (which has more point that is currently pictured). The point is excellent at getting into little creviced on the face.

The other sides a re a little gimmicky but usable (although I never use the smaller rectangular facets for anything!). Overall I think I prefer using their brushes with rounded sides, and I think their shape feels more natural in the hand as well. Still, I have no complaints about this one, and I really like the texture of it. The pleasant point to this one probably renders this a tie. Basically, I think you need a Real Techniques Face Sponge, but I don't think it matters which one; since the other is cheaper, I would probably go with it.

It is a very soft sponge, pleasant feeling on the skin, and it seems made from quality material. It washes clean and dries well. Another good sponge from Real Techniques (I like their others equally well.) Yes To Face Wipes for Women and Men, Sensitive Facial Cleansing Wipes for use as a Make Up Remover, Cleaning, Soothing, Cucumbers Aloe Vera (Pack of 2) Yes To ["Yes To Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes gently remove dirt, sweat and makeup (eye makeup too!) without the need to rinse. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Subdued Colors:** The user enjoys eyeshadow palettes with muted, earthy tones, leaning toward muted jewel tones.

- **Quality Over Boldness:** They prioritize quality in product formulation, valuing texture and longevity over bold color payoff, with a strong preference for products that blend easily without excessive fallout.

- **Specific Color Expectations:** The user expresses disappointment when colors do not meet expectations, particularly in the green and jewel tone families.

- **Accessibility and Sensitivity Needs:** They exhibit a strong focus on sensitivity and gentleness in skincare products, indicating a need for hypoallergenic options that do not irritate their skin.

- **Accessory Appreciation:** They appreciate effectively designed tools accompanying makeup products, indicating satisfaction with the functionality of makeup applicators.

- **Analytical Reviews:** Their reviews reflect a critical approach, emphasizing product details and performance, scrutinizing marketing claims and factual accuracy.

- **Mixed Feelings About Expectations:** The user acknowledges discrepancies between product marketing and actual performance, desiring clarity in descriptions.

- **General Applicator Preferences:** Although they recently tried a satisfactory makeup sponge, they primarily prefer traditional brushes and value high-quality materials and usability in all tools.

Overall, the user seeks high-quality, subdued eye makeup products that cater to their sensitive skin needs, alongside effective applicators that align with their analytical evaluation standards. They consider gentle cleansing options essential in their routine while acknowledging settings where wipes serve as convenient alternatives.
